info.author: Tetrad Implemented by DataShop@CMU datashop-help@lists.andrew.cmu.edu
info.abstract:
The missing values box takes as input a data set, and can either replace the missing values with a real value or it can inject missing data into the set.
Tetrad Website
info.options:
Operation - What you would like to do to the data.
Inject Missing data - Injects "*"'s with the specified probability Missing Value Marker - What marker is used to denote missing values.
